website_summaries.verdict: You may like this model if you plan to use it for sitting as much as sleeping. Be aware of the possibility of noticeable springs before you buy it.
pros: Made by a popular name in bedding
Users find it especially comfortable for seating
cons: It's heavy, and some owners find it uncomfortable for sleeping, as they can feel the interior springs

customer_reviews.title: Broken spring.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic tabs poke at you while you try to sleep, heavy and hard to fold up when using as seat or couch. Can feel the springs under you while trying to sleep. I'm able to deal with all the above...But within 5 months a spring broke and started poking through. Flipped it over and will use it until it dies, but will never buy again. Edit: I was wrong, I had forgotten that the other side was even worse and I could feel every spring digging into me that much more. Ordered a memory foam and I plan to avoid the name Serta completely from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan P.

customer_reviews.title: It was filthy!!
customer_reviews.text: It came on time and for the type of mattress, it's on par. But the packaging it came in only covered the middle. It was rolled like a taquito in plastic and the edges were filthy; like someone dragged them along the road. Dark black dirt that won't come out. My family was coming for a visit 2 days later and this was their sleeping arrangements. I had no time to return it. I just keep it covered with a fitted sheet, but they need way better packaging for this mattress. That was crazy bad, cheap crap packaging that left it filthy.
customer_reviews.author: Quirky

customer_reviews.title: Springs are poking my behind after only 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: After several weeks of chemical smells (flame retardant, bug treatment, ??) emanating from this mattress after it was delivered in the winter, I thought I was home free. I was shocked when I started feeling the springs of the mattress after only 4 months. Now 6 months later, the mattress is barely usable and is painful to sit on. My last heavy spring mattress lasted about 13 years before I noticed internal spring issues. This one didn't last half a year. If I could return or get a refund, I would try. I don't usually write reviews or try to make returns. However, this product was horrible. Maybe it was defective? Cross your fingers and find out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The small detail that kills...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy enough but it pretty stiff to put on the futon frame but I assume it will last longer.. I was shocked to see that the stitches are white plastic. I don't mind the plastic but at least blend in the color. White looks unfinished..
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P.

customer_reviews.title: Serta Cypress Double Sided Innerspring Full Futon Mattress Comfortable To Sleep On. Durable and Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, quality futon mattress arrived to my home without any problems. Neutral khaki color blended well with apartment décor and was easy enough to spot clean. No problems with the mattress at all with slipping while sitting on it ~ was a replacement mattress for a worn out mattress of an older, futon frame. There were no problems with a guest sleeping on it and it was comfortable. Would definitely recommend this futon mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Linda In Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Spring Poked Through Mattress on Day 2
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Super convenient to get a futon delivered to my door. Very comfortable sprung mattress; I like it as well comfort wise as several I've tried at twice the price. Con: Spring poked right through the outer canvas shell on the second day of use. Repackaging this into a convenient roll as shipped was next to impossible, and I waited too long to drag it to Amazon to let them deal with it (IIRC they didn't permit local dropoff, but required UPS). Cherry on top: Removed my last review of the product.
customer_reviews.author: George S. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress in an Amazon bundle deal offered with a trifold futon. After reading the reviews, I thought it worth the chance. It's not fancy, but the cover is heavy canvas that should last a long time. I have heavy quilts that I use to cover my furniture to suit my style and protection from cat hair and claws. The firmness level is medium and just right for me. I also like that both sides are the same, as occasional flipping extends the life and comfort. I would buy this mattress again.
customer_reviews.author: soloangel58

customer_reviews.title: So far it looks like a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a product that is made in the USA, so I paid a little more for this. So far it looks like a great purchase. I haven't got it set up on the futon yet, but it appears and feels the way I expected It should work fine either in the couch position or the flat position. Appears well -made and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Mo Marie

customer_reviews.title: if you are at all sensitive to odors, do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Smell did not fade in the amount of time before I had to return it. A very strong smell. I don't believe it would fade over time. Return process was easy. Although, it was nearly impossible to get the mattress back in the box. Without two strong men, and myself, it would never have been compressible back into that box.
customer_reviews.author: Roddy

customer_reviews.title: Great mattess! Far exceeded my expectations and my guests ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mattess! Far exceeded my expectations and my guests were well please and quite refreshed after sleeping on it. They spent a week amd had no complaints, in fact they were refreshed after a good night's sleep. An excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: sunnystar

customer_reviews.title: chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The mattress itself is fine, but the chemical smell is almost intolerable. We've had this for several months, and sometimes I still have to leave the room because the smell makes me nauseated. We cover it with a blanket when we're on it, I open the windows and point a fan at it, but it's still horrible. I'd happily give this product 5 stars, if it didn't make me sick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It came with a small rip in it at one of the basting points. Too big a hassle to return so I covered it with a pillow and put it where it would get the least traffic. It's very comfortable to sleep on. SO NOT a Serta. No big deal, I like that it's American Made, but if you want a Serta these are made by Wolf so no clue why it says Serta.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Webster

customer_reviews.title: Brand New... Literally.
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for the price. As far as the chemical smell; yes it does exist, but I received it on the 25th and the tag sewn onto it by law says Wolf manufactured it on the 17th, so for being only a week old I'd say it's overall a really acceptable level of odor. I just put a sheet on it and cannot smell it at all anymore. I will update if chemical smell comes back or gets worse, but for now I am very happy with the purchase and price I found.
customer_reviews.author: Nuthinbuthetruth

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress came tightly wrapped in a roll. I thought that it would expand with time after being unrolled like my older mattress that this one was purchased to replace, but mine never did. It's supposed to be an 8 inch mattress but the one that I recieved is barely 6 inches thick and as firm as a board. My old 8 inch mattress is pictured below this one with measurements. I thought this one would be better than my old mattress because it's Serta brand but I feel like I'm sleeping on a board every night.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress but SMELLY
customer_reviews.text: We both enjoy this mattress and are happy on how comfortable it feels. The only thing we hate is how bad it smells. Its been a week and the smell is still around. We even left it outside in the sun all day Saturday and it's still there. I wonder if it will ever go away.
customer_reviews.author: PandA

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the springs. Worse than my worn out 10 year old futon. Also lumpy and bumpy when you fold it to be a couch. Not a quality product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hez

customer_reviews.title: 2 years in - not so great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in 2016 and it is thin and uncomfortable. Surprising that it is innerspring - can't feel them at all. This is used mostly as a couch, only unfolded for guests. So 2 years later we are looking for another - more comfortable- futon mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: I like the color and overall its comfortable to sit on
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and overall its comfortable to sit on. What I don't like is that in a couple of spot along the seams the coils push through the padding and you can feel them. I think that eventually they will poke through the cover and I'm worried about my kids or pets getting hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because we had company coming for two weeks. She said she slept very good on it. Was very comfortable.She was visiting from Germany,I guess they don't have inter-spring mattresses so much. She is thinking about getting one now. My only concern is that is won't bend to go into couch position, because it is pretty thick,
customer_reviews.author: farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks different than pictures
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The “tufts” are really cheesy pices of plastic, kind of like the plastic tags that are in new clothes but super thick & white. This will definitely need a cover so it was pointless to pick a color. Hands down wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable futon mattress.  Good value for sleeping and sitting.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that this is a very comfortable futon mattress. Good value for sleeping and sitting. However, the presentation and finish could use some work. Overall appearance out of box is Ok, but lots of wrinkles in fabric. I've had the better part of two months, and it still hasn't completely settled to wrinkle free. The fabric is rough, and I'm probably leaning towards purchasing a cover. Another complaint is with the cheap white tabs used throughout. They are stick like and not comfortable to come into contact with, further supporting the need to purchase a cover.
customer_reviews.author: sanford7575

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy, thick and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My shipment arrived on time. After opening the box it took a little while to "plump" up. My son uses the futon and mattress as his couch and I use it to sleep on when I go visit occasionally. When we went to fold the mattress and create the couch, it was hard to fold but after a little work and several tries, it folded exactly the way we wanted. I even didn't like the way it was sitting when it was folded in half and we were able to fold it better so the back part was higher and the leg area didn't hang off.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Muir

customer_reviews.title: Very thick
customer_reviews.text: Very thick, so you can't feel the springs, which is good. But it has decorative peg type pieces that anchor the two sides together and if you aren't careful they can catch on your sheet and possibly cause a hole or scratch the person sleeping on the mattress, it's not a huge issue just a minor inconvenience that can be easily avoided. This mattress is heavy, so recommend two people to maneuver. Great investment of your futon gets regular use!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: The quality is quite good. You can feel the "bumps" a bit where ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. A bit difficult to get out of box, but that can be expected because it is a mattress compressed to fit into a shippable box. This mattress is certainly on the firm side, but that is what I need for my back. The quality is quite good. You can feel the "bumps" a bit where it is tied, but that should also be expected. It is comfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Fayelon

customer_reviews.title: Tried two others and had almost given up.
customer_reviews.text: This futon mattress is very comfortable and firm without being too firm. Be careful, if you use this for guests, they may not want to leave.
customer_reviews.author: toesnorth

customer_reviews.title: The futon is very comfortable in the sitting position
customer_reviews.text: The futon is very comfortable in the sitting position. It is very soft for sleeping so if you like that, you will love this. I toss and turn on this futon because my hips and back became sore enough to wake me up after a few hours. So if you prefer soft then you will love this. I need more support.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks great too
customer_reviews.text: Well made and looks great too. The Wolf corp offers a variety of futon mattress. Mine has a inner spring core that is covered with a thick foam which is then covered with a thick layer of cotton/poly fiber feeling. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I researched so many futon mattresses, and decided on getting the Serta brand. I am glad that I did. It is well made, and really quite comfortable. Would recommend this mattress to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Stolarz

customer_reviews.title: Not the best...but not the worst
customer_reviews.text: This futon mattress is just OK. It really is not very firm at all and not super comfortable - but it's not horrible either. Returning it would be out of the question because of repackaging would be next to impossible. I will be purchasing a foam mattress topper for it to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: bears

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: It is great and firm, comfortable. But there is some odor not really unpleasant but does not seems to go away. Also very heavy and it is sliding constantly off the futon bed frame when folded as sofa position. I wish that there is some strap or something that it can be attached to the frame to prevent sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Ivona GS

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: After letting the mattress rest (rise to full size) it has grown to about 5 inches instead of the full 8 inches that it should be. It is good to sleep on, not lumpy as I thought it could be. It seems to be very well made. I am going to keep it. The price was very good, just not quite what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Use this product for a couch for spare room, and as a bed for company. It’s pretty comfortable, but we do add a 3 inch topper when made up to a bed. It’s help make our only other bedroom besides the master more versatile. The khaki color is neutral so you can accessorize with any color.
customer_reviews.author: G.D.B.

customer_reviews.title: slept on it the first night and it's really comfortable! Just the right amount of firmness and give
customer_reviews.text: I just got this, slept on it the first night and it's really comfortable! Just the right amount of firmness and give, because of the coils. Delivery was great, it was tightly rolled up in plastic and also inside a box. I just took it out of the plastic, placed it on my frame, lined up the top, cut the plastic and it sprang out into place. The only negative was the chemical smell, maybe from the plastic? If you can, you should let it air out first. Otherwise, this is an excellent mattress and price!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McKenna

customer_reviews.title: HAZARD DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it was only used half a dozen times. My son cut his leg on it yesterday because it has this HUGE hook sticking out of it. I tried to cut it off with wire cutters but it’s such a strong hook, it won’t cut. Do NOT buy this or you could get hurt-BADLY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical bc of how thin the mattress is, but it's very springy and comfy! Love it. The price is excellent for the product you get.
customer_reviews.author: KCap

customer_reviews.title: took a "shot" because we trust Amazon
customer_reviews.text: took a "shot" because we trust Amazon to back up. Truthfully, expected reun of mill crap: instead got GREAT mattress for gust room. Spouse & I laughed; had we known how good & firm this mattress is we would have saved a BUNDLE by also getting identical for ourselves. Oh, well...
customer_reviews.author: econPROF

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable and it led to back pain after using 2-3 months. Now looking for other options and resell this one. 😒
customer_reviews.author: sarthak

customer_reviews.title: Keep Scrolling-Do not Purchase this mattress
customer_reviews.text: If I could give no stars I would! This is not a Serta product, nor is it 8" think. Not a quality product at all. Do not purchase this mattress!!!!
customer_reviews.author: doglover750

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Was disappointed with the shipping
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Was disappointed with the shipping. Huge Grease Mark on the corner,but bought a cover for it. Stitching seems a bit under par also. Unzipped cover and the filing was also grease stained. For the price I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Packaging sucks...product very good
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable than the old mattress. I would have given five stars but the packaging was really substandard and significantly destroyed. If this had to be delivered another block it probably wouldn’t have made it.
customer_reviews.author: irish-george

customer_reviews.title: Was not as much like an innerspring mattress as it was like a padded ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not as much like an innerspring mattress as it was like a padded gym mat. Somewhat disappointed, but I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Aerostat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the white zipper etc.
customer_reviews.text: Picture does not show that the tufts have a noticeable and uncomfortable white plastic thingy. Also the zipper is white and very noticeable against the grey fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money as a BED!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe the difference. I do not know about folding it up but as a bed (I use every night) it is AMAZING! I have spinal problem and this bed coupled with a mattress cover on top is perfect support.
customer_reviews.author: Gun nut 34

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. However
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. However, color in internet photo is not what was delivered. The internet photo shows a light cream khakis. The one I received is an army green/brown khakis color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good matress for futon. Fair price
customer_reviews.text: We were amazed as it rolled out for the first time from the packaging. It is really a nice, firm mattress. And yes, it is a Serta.
customer_reviews.author: DTB

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy for me
customer_reviews.text: 6 months after light use we are disappointed. The inside padding shifts so badly it leaves bumps and will not lay flat. We have rotated it, not helping, just compresses, and shifts to a new lump and depression.
customer_reviews.author: CyndiG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: The product was just as described, very comfortable, thick and plush! Nice fabric and color, I believe it will last a long time. Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: mandiandfamily

customer_reviews.title: Best futon ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most comfortable futon I have ever slept on. I looked at other futons in local stores and all of them were charging at least $80.00 more for a similar futon and their futon quality was not nearly as good as this one. My original plan was to use this as a guest bed since I live in a 1bd apartment but after sleeping on this myself for the past few nights I have changed my mind and I'm now going to use this as my bed. When you combine the product with the awesome service Amazon provides I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Advertising incredibly misleading
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this futon under the impression that it included the mattress AND the frame, come to find out it is only the mattress. This is not what the pictures or description impresses. I went back to the product and had to scroll into the fine print to be informed that this was only the mattress. Very disappointing. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: jayneanne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm disabled. I live on my futon. I sleep on it too. This thing is the best mattress I've ever had. I been through a least 6 others
customer_reviews.author: Knarf

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is comfortable not only to sit on but also to sleep on. We have an old dog (17 years old) and some nights she has problems falling to sleep. So I take her to the living room to rest with her alone. That way she doesn’t disturb my husband, who is older and sleeps very light.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dubak

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: save the tags when cutting them off - they are needed for warranty purposes
customer_reviews.author: Todd Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a LITTLE tiny bit rough. But the quality and style is nice! It’s pretty thick too, just what we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna W.

customer_reviews.title: I can't speak to quality, but this company didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to quality, but this company didn't allow returns, or to cancel the order after it was placed, so it left me stuck with a mattress I didn't end up needing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a real hit with my son and daughter-in-law ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a real hit with my son and daughter-in-law. The only complaint is the white marks on the mattress. I'm not sure why they are there. My daughter in law said I could use a black marker to blacken them. Any other suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: A. Winifred Gido

customer_reviews.title: disappointed. If you are going to advertise a product ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a Serta mattress. It is made by the Wolf Corporation. Feel hoodwinked, disappointed. If you are going to advertise a product as a Serta please sell what you advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Worst product and huge disappointment!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money and time. It feels like you are sleeping on bare bulk of metal coils.
customer_reviews.author: Mil

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! You don't feel the futon under it. Seems like it will last well. I depend on product reviews, and they were right!
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable in a compact form which expands rapidly into your instant bed. Loved the warning to keep pets and children away when opening. It does indeed spring out of the plastic - similar to that old joke snake in the can.
customer_reviews.author: LilP

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and the mattress is extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The more expensive covering seems to be worth it.It is very sturdy and the mattress is extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ravensmom

customer_reviews.title: The Futon Mattress is lumpy
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with the futon mattress. I had bought one before and was satisfied with it and it lasted a long time, possibly 3 years. The new mattress is lumpy and not well padded. I would return it but it would be very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Marquez

customer_reviews.title: like a firm mattress
customer_reviews.text: Get it! The springs add just the right amount of support, like a firm mattress. Great for sleeping. It may not say Serta on the package but this Made in the USA product is better. No strong odor. Folds in the right place and stays in place after folded, no slipping and I don't have brackets and stoppers. My guest thanked me for getting such a nice mattress.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Innerspring comfort!
customer_reviews.text: A definite improvement over the standard 'bale of cotton' that came with the futon.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Cockerham

customer_reviews.title: The price is fantastic. You can feel the springs a little but ...
customer_reviews.text: The price is fantastic. You can feel the springs a little but way more comfortable than a sofa bed. Very happy over all.
customer_reviews.author: cook4funpcb

customer_reviews.title: Besides a little creaking from the springs it's great. Being a queen size it works well for ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattresses couple weeks ago for our guest bedroom. As we have recently moved - waiting for our furniture to arrive, the futon has been our bed for some time. Besides a little creaking from the springs it's great. Being a queen size it works well for couples rather than most futons being small double beds. Very comfortable and well worth the money. I'm happy we got something comfortable rather than a cheap mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Raible

customer_reviews.title: comfort over function
customer_reviews.text: Springs much much more comfortable but no longer can turn into couch
customer_reviews.author: Aaron lee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! I already had the futon I just needed a mattress for it. This mattress is very comfortable and easy to maneuver which is important to me because I would be laying it out and putting it up most likely by myself. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Delauter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mattress. Yeah, you know there are springs there, but not uncomfortable at all. But... Moving it by yourself would be a real chore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the color and style work perfectly for our newly remodeled ...
customer_reviews.text: the color and style work perfectly for our newly remodeled porch. We bought it to go with the queen size bi fold futon sofa bed.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Get a mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: Pretty firm. Feels like the manual stuffed cotton filled beds of old.
customer_reviews.author: Angela F.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good product, a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product, a great purchase. I'm impressed that it has springs in it. It's bouncy and you don't feel a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Interpreterboy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: A lot more comfortable than most futon mattresses I’ve tried. I have a bad back and usually can not sleep on a futon, but was able to with this one
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bakshi

customer_reviews.title: This couch broke a week after purchase... ...
customer_reviews.text: This couch broke a week after purchase....Also in order to fold it back in it requires to people doing the task
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The matters runs larger than a full but not as large as a queen.
customer_reviews.text: I like the mattress, it’s a little bit too large for my full futon frame though.
customer_reviews.author: My Favorite site

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: It is EXTREMELY thin. Looks cheap. I ordered brown and it literally looks like a pair of jeans- denim blue! I am extremely disappointed at how thin it is. Pieces of string are where the mattress is tufted. It looks so bad!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Firmer feeling than our previous foam mattress. Hopefully for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: wendy james

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully comfortable mattress! Bought two!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to replace 20 year old futon mattresses in a cottage. Incredibly comfortable! Our backs feel so much better :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: fit and feels perfectly. did have a smell that we let air out for 2 days and used some frebreeze to help remove, over all great
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new and different sized futon. Much lighter than the more traditional.
customer_reviews.author: DA Elf

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: I don't fold it, just use it flat. It is super comfy and i sleep really well. I often have sleep and rest issues. This bed has not let me down.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!  Great futon mattress.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our weekend cabin, and have been extremely pleased with it. Very comfortable and we both sleep soundly. Would most certainly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Hooligan

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: It's thick and comfortable. Takes a little effort to bend it the first time but once there you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie C.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: ... pillow topper of goose/duck and this is the most comfortable bed you own
customer_reviews.text: Add a pillow topper of goose/duck and this is the most comfortable bed you own....
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress. I no longer wake up in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and convenience  in a mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was perfect for my back. I bought a second one for my camper bed after getting the first one. It's firm but not hard. I've had it about a month and so far so good. It is very very heavy though. It takes 2 people to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement mattress
customer_reviews.text: Nice replacement mattress for cabin futon. Much better than the original 4in. mattress for sleeping extra people.
customer_reviews.author: Chickiepoo1

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great futon mattress. Comfy but it needs a little time to be broken in to get rid of the "smell".
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping. Mattress is thick and so comfortable . My son slept well on this mattress
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but only expanded to 6". If it wasn't so large and bulky, I would've returned it.
customer_reviews.author: soma

customer_reviews.title: Great futon mattress, a bit firm
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the kind of futon mattress I needed after the old one gave out. It's a bit on the firm side, about what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: largesse

customer_reviews.title: People say this is really comfortable! It's incredibly heavy and difficult to move
customer_reviews.text: People say this is really comfortable! It's incredibly heavy and difficult to move, but it is great to sleep on, and fits wonderfully on my queen size Savannah Futon Sofa bed.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Find a more comfortable option
customer_reviews.text: This replacement futon is less comfortable than the old, worn down futon we had before this! If you're looking for comfort, look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Kent N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first futon mattress. It is comfortable and folds up easily into a seating position. I have slept on it for a several months now and it is a high quality mattress at an affordable cost! I am extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product I have used for a couple yrs now in a rv with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Had no padding at all. Had a foul odor that gave us all headaches. Returned immediately to get a different product.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: But after breaking it in it works as bed and chair position just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress came on time. A bit hard to fold back up into a couch/chair position. But after breaking it in it works as bed and chair position just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lan

customer_reviews.title: Good futon mattress alternative
customer_reviews.text: Good futon mattress alternative. A little tricky to bend into a couch on the older metal frames by myself. Guest have been very happy with it. Covering it with a softer velvet or ultra suede like futon cover helps.
customer_reviews.author: Dafna Yachin

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is a great mattress. It's actually pretty comfy
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great mattress. It's actually pretty comfy, no huge complaints about it. I use it on the ground, so if I want to fold it, it's pretty easy to fold it into couch mode.
customer_reviews.author: Ccc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Makes a great additional bed for when relatives come to visit!
customer_reviews.author: Ang-e

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this mattress. It fits our frame and is very comfortable to sit on or sleep on
customer_reviews.author: T Hendrix

product_meta.title: Serta Cypress Double Sided Innerspring Futon Mattress, Full, Antelope, Made in the USA
product_meta.description: Size:Full| Color:BrownWolf Corporation is the oldest Serta licensee, proud to say we are the sole manufacturer of Serta Futon Mattresses! Serta Futon Mattresses feature Cottonique. Cottonique combines selected grades of cotton with polyester fibers for a unique, durable upholstery blend that outperforms and outlasts traditional cotton batting. As a result Serta futons are more resilient, more comfortable and yet surprisingly light. The Cypress futon mattress contains a 4" spring unit and so there will be more of a bounce to this mattress. The spring unit is surrounded by 2, 1" foam pieces that provide supple, body conforming comfort. The Serta Cypress is a 8" mattress built for years of comfort. It is constructed with 3 layers of heavy weight cotton fiber blend that surround the foam and innerspring unit. Machine lace tufts and true box casing construction complete the Cypress. This Cypress futon mattress is covered in an antelope upholstery grade fabric and is full size, 54" x 75". All Serta Futon mattresses are compressed, rolled and boxed which makes for ease in shipping and installation.
feature_bullets: Serta Futons feature Cottonique which combines selected grades of cotton with polyester for a unique, durable blend
Serta futons are more resilient, more comfortable and yet surprisingly light
Serta Cypress is a 8" mattress built for years of comfort
Constructed with 3 layers of cotton fiber blend that surround the 2, 1" foam and innerspring unit
Machine lace tufts and true box casing construction complete the Pinehurst which is made in the USA
Note: Color may slightly vary due to lighting
